name: Catshooter
description:
A cat shooting simulator, edited from the TANKS! tutorial. No cats were harmed in the making of this game.

CHANGES:

- Bouncy food (large) added as furniture

- Bouncy food (small) added as props

- Cats now shoot cats instead of bullets

- No more bullets, so...no more death. Shoot cats indefinitely, until you refresh or quit

- Cant play on Chrome

I had attempted to add the twitter API, but it was outdated and no longer worked. (The scripting to make it work again was out of my scope).
